body: Young women across the continent lead Africa's tech scene: "Africa is a rich mixture of countries and ethnicities and its women are equally diverse in their leadership. I found it interesting to take a look at some of the women who were noted in 2010 in tech and media."

title: Africa: Young Women Lead Africa's Tech Scene

sentence: Young women across the continent lead Africa's tech scene: "Africa is a rich mixture of countries and ethnicities and its women are equally diverse in their leadership.
I found it interesting to take a look at some of the women who were noted in 2010 in tech and media."
